snippet.title: THE HUNGRY FLY Official Launch Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase (2024)
snippet.description:
THE HUNGRY FLY Official Launch Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase (2024)

Check out the new game trailer for The Hungry Fly 2024 in FULL HD. Once upon a time, there was a fly. A hungry fly. A fly with razor-sharp teeth, with a taste for dead things. This is the tale of its adventure to find something dead to devour, in a swamp where nothing dies, everything is grotesque, and every choice matters, no matter how surreal. The Hungry Fly is available now on PC via Steam.

Genre: Adventure, Indie
Developer: Erupting Avocado
Publisher: indie.io
Release Date: 23 Oct, 2024

Want to be notified of all the latest game clips & trailers? 
Subscribe to our channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqjQnubC-rq8sRJHJik7eUA
